info.name: The DarkKiwi
info.description: A Darker forum skin for those two like to browse in darker conditions.
info.additionalInfo:
WARNING: If you are using this on Chrome, there is a small bug that the CKEditor doesn't have the correct colors when you are making private messages. To fix this, simply switch your editor mode so that the colors are corrected. Apologies for the inconvenience. I will search for a solution eventually.  



7/2/2016: Published
7/4/2016: Fixed a few inconsistent colors with the FAQ, CKE and a few other things.
7/6/2016: Fixed a Chrome-specific issue with the CKE. Thanks to the Augster
